attributes.action: Remove Matt Hancock as MP for West Suffolk
attributes.additional_details: We had an important meeting with our local MP, Matt Hancock, which was cancelled by his office on the day it was announced he was entering the jungle. We know Mr Hancock has been suspended from the Conservative party but he remains our MP. We need someone who will work for the local people.
attributes.background: Parliament needs to enforce termination of his appointment so we can move forward with an MP who is prepared to work for the locals.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
